alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northern Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oakleaf Plantation, or near Middleburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Middleburg, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Maxville, Fleming Island, Baymeadows, Ortega and Oakleaf Plantation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
